isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS, AND BUMPER - PROSTAR™ - REMOVE AND INSTALL PROCEDURES - Torsion Bars

step1.para: Remove four mount screws from the lower portion of the grille ( Figure 13, Items 3 and 4).
To remove the grille, lift the grille out to release the tabs from the tab inserts ( Figure 13, Items 2 and 3).
Place the grille upside down on a padded surface to protect the finished surface of the grille.
Release hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood assembly to a 45-degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the tilt assist cylinder assembly.

warning.para: The hood torsion bars become spring loaded as the hood is closed and are unloaded when the hood is in the open position. Therefore, the hood must be in the open position to remove or install the torsion bars from the hood. Failure to comply may result in injury to personnel.

note.para: Prior to removal, mark each torsion bar to show which side the torsion bars mount on the hood.

step1.para: Remove three bolts from the left torsion bar mount plate ( Figure 19, Items 2 and 6).
Remove left torsion bar mount plate from left torsion bar ( Figure 19, Items 2 and 3).
Loosen, but do not remove, two bolts on the left torsion bar load bracket ( Figure 19, Items 4 and 5).
Slide the left torsion bar out of the hood hinge rod and remove left torsion bar ( Figure 19, Items 1 and 3).
Remove three bolts from the right torsion bar mount plate ( Figure 20, Items 3 and 4).
Remove right torsion bar mount plate from right torsion bar ( Figure 20, Items 1 and 4).
Loosen, but do not remove, two bolts on the right torsion bar load bracket ( Figure 20, Items 5 and 6).
Slide the right torsion bar out of the hood hinge rod and remove right torsion bar ( Figure 20, Items 1 and 2).
Install the right torsion bar through the hood hinge rod and align right torsion bar on the load bracket ( Figure 20, Items 1, 2, and 6).
Position right torsion bar mount plate on the right torsion bar ( Figure 20, Items 1 and 4).
Install three bolts in right torsion bar mount plate ( Figure 20, Items 3 and 4). Torque bolts to 6 to 8 lbf-ft (8 to 11 N•m).
Secure the right torsion bar load bracket by tightening two bolts ( Figure 20, Items 5 and 6).
Install the left torsion bar through the hood hinge rod and align left torsion bar on the left load bracket ( Figure 19, Items 1, 3, and 5).
Position left torsion bar mount plate on the left torsion bar ( Figure 19, Items 2 and 3).
Install three bolts in left torsion bar mount plate ( Figure 19, Items 2 and 6). Torque bolts to 6 to 8 lbf-ft (8 to 11 N•m).
Secure the left torsion bar load bracket by tightening two bolts ( Figure 19, Items 4 and 5).
Align grille insert tabs with the hood insert holes ( Figure 13, Items 2 and 3).
With the palm of your hand, press the grille at all six insert tab locations to seat grille onto the hood ( Figure 13, Items 1, 2, and 3).
Install four mount screws in bottom of grille ( Figure 13, Items 3 and 4). Torque screws to 4 to 5 lbf-ft (5 to 7 N•m).
Check hood operation and close and latch hood.
